title: webdav not working with 4.5.4
body:
when i navigate to /remote.php/webdav in my browser with the most recent released server version (4.5.4), i get this:
```
notice: undefined offset: 0 in /www/owncloud/lib/files.php on line 48
call stack: 0.0001 637736
1. {main}() /www/owncloud/remote.php:0 0.0148 993480
2. require_once('/www/owncloud/apps/files/appinfo/remote.php') /www/owncloud/remote.php:40 0.0327 1330768
3. sabre_dav_server->exec() /www/owncloud/apps/files/appinfo/remote.php:48 0.0328 1330904
4. sabre_dav_server->invokemethod() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/server.php:206 0.0328 1331736
5. sabre_dav_server->broadcastevent() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/server.php:437 0.1140 1593336
6. call_user_func_array() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/server.php:415 0.1140 1593952
7. sabre_dav_browser_plugin->httpgetinterceptor() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/server.php:0 0.1143 1595096
8. sabre_dav_browser_plugin->generatedirectoryindex() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/browser/plugin.php:135 0.3083 1882672
9. oc_connector_sabre_directory->getchild() /www/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/browser/plugin.php:341 0.3083 1882888
10. oc_files::getfileinfo() /www/owncloud/lib/connector/sabre/directory.php:96

sabre_dav_exception_notfound file with name /shared could not be located 1.6.4 
```
and there's only this, there is no directory listing as there used to be (before, when i still had 4.5.2).

regarding the exception about "/shared": there is a shared directory in the files folder of the logged in user; but i also don't understand why it would even need to exist; since it's the first time webdav access, so the "root" folder should be shown...

the apache error log has the same message, but not the sabre_dav_exception.

my configuration:
apache 2.2.22
mysql 5.5.28
php 5.3.10
all that running on an ubuntu server 12.04 x86_64
